h1_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top
content: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top are the final duo of fighters you'll go up against in Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. The familiar duo of Yaoguai Chiefs can be found in the Chapter's secret area.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Top_Takes_Bottom,_Bottom_Takes_Top.md", under the primary heading "Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top". The content is presented below:

Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top are the final duo of fighters you'll go up against in Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. The familiar duo of Yaoguai Chiefs can be found in the Chapter's secret area.
